credit_line: Bequest of Mrs. Horace W. Frost
title: Lalit Ragini, Page from a Dispersed Ragamala Set
medium: opaque watercolor on paper, heightened with gold
description: Incorrectly inscribed as Desakar Ragini. From same Ragamala Set as 73.1
inscriptions: u.c. in pencil: [calligraphic inscription "Of Megha Raga, the third Ragini, Desakar"]; in red border in pencil: [five arrows pointing to image]; verso u.c. in pencil: [illegible marks and numbers] [36]/ Lalita
